text: Oreosaurus mcdiarmidi is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Chimantá Massif in Venezuela. It is named for , American herpetologist, "for his contribution to the knowledge of the Pantepui herpetofauna". ==References== Category:Oreosaurus Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Endemic fauna of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 2011 Category:Taxa named by Philippe J.R. Kok Category:Taxa named by Gilson Rivas
title: Oreosaurus mcdiarmidi
